title: (Thurs Early Bird) Should Bobby Go To Adult Basketball Fantasy Camp? + Amy vs. Lunchbox + Mailbag: Do We Ever Call Lunchbox By His Real Name?
itunes:title: (Thurs Early Bird) Should Bobby Go To Adult Basketball Fantasy Camp? + Amy vs. Lunchbox + Mailbag: Do We Ever Call Lunchbox By His Real Name?
description:
Bobby might go to an adult basketball fantasy camp with his friend for a week, but isn't sure if he should since it would require a lot of training. We share our thoughts on what he should do! Plus, we play another round of Amy vs. Lunchbox, where they both answer easy questions. Find out who the person who lost was and what they had to eat that was so disgusting they almost threw up! Mailbag: a listener wrote in wondering if we ever call Lunchbox by his real name. Hear if we do and if Lunchbox even gets called by his real name anymore.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
